00027 
00028  SUBROUTINE CollisionF
00029 
00030 ! Common Variables
00031  USE NTypes,      ONLY : DBL
00032  USE Domain,      ONLY : xmax_f, xmin_f, ymax_f, ymin_f
00033  USE FluidParams
00034  USE LBMParams,   ONLY : f, fcol
00035  IMPLICIT NONE
00036 
00037 ! Local Variables
00038  INTEGER :: i, j
00039  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: ux, uy
00040  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: phin, muPhi
00041  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Af0, Af1, Cfp
00042 
00043 
00044  DO j = ymin_f, ymax_f
00045    DO i = xmin_f, xmax_f
00046 
00047 ! Local values of phi and the chemical potential
00048      ux    = u_f(i,j,1)
00049      uy    = u_f(i,j,2)
00050      phin  = phi_f(i,j)
00051      muPhi = alpha4*phin*( phin*phin - phistar2 ) - kappa*lapPhi_f(i,j)
00052 
00053 ! Collision
00054      Af1 = 0.5D0*Gamma*muPhi
00055      Af0 = -2.D0*Gamma*muPhi
00056      Cfp = invEta2*phin
00057      f(i,j,0)    = f(i,j,0) + invTauPhi*( Af0 + phin   - f(i,j,0) )
00058      fcol(i,j,1) = f(i,j,1) + invTauPhi*( Af1 + Cfp*ux - f(i,j,1) )
00059      fcol(i,j,2) = f(i,j,2) + invTauPhi*( Af1 + Cfp*uy - f(i,j,2) )
00060      fcol(i,j,3) = f(i,j,3) + invTauPhi*( Af1 - Cfp*ux - f(i,j,3) )
00061      fcol(i,j,4) = f(i,j,4) + invTauPhi*( Af1 - Cfp*uy - f(i,j,4) )
00062 
00063    END DO
00064  END DO
00065 
00066  RETURN
00067  END SUBROUTINE CollisionF
